janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha senadhinayakaya lesa da, wathman janadhipathi gotabhaya rajapaksha ewakata aarakshaka amathyanshaye lekamwaraya lesa da, ema lewaki yuddhayata nayakathwaya dunha. 2009 di eltitiee ya parajaya kirimen nimawu yuddhaye awasan bhagayedi, 40,000 kata adhika siwil janaya mara damunu athara delakshayakata adhika sankhyawak milatariyen palanaya wana kandawuru thula balahathkarayen gal keruni.
